channel.title: Finance on Omer Perach
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on Omer Perach

item.title: GenoSee Business Model
item.description: Executive Summary Wordlwide climate change and decrease in arable lands and lands under permanent crops constitute a major concern for future food safety. Private and goverment based breeding programs working constantly to develop elite crops in order to meet the future demand to feed 10 billion people by 2050. Under these constraints, to meet the rising demand for food, agricultural production must increase by an estimated 50% without greatly increasing water usage or expanding the total land area dedicated to agriculture.
